verses.verse: I <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; How then should I <S%H995>look<s%> upon a <S%H1330>virgin<s%>?
For what is the <S%H2506>portion<s%> from <S%H433>God<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>, And the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> from the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>?
Is it not <S%H343>calamity<s%> to the <S%H5767>unrighteous<s%>, And <S%H5235>disaster<s%> to the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>?
Doth not he <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, And <S%H5608>number<s%> all my <S%H6806>steps<s%>?
If I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H7723>falsehood<s%>, And my <S%H7272>foot<s%> hath <S%H2363>hasted<s%> to <S%H4820>deceit<s%>
(Let me be <S%H8254>weighed<s%> in an <S%H6664>even<s%> <S%H3976>balance<s%>, That <S%H433>God<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> mine <S%H8538>integrity<s%>);

If my <S%H838>step<s%> hath turned <S%H5186>out<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, And my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, And if any <S%H3971>spot<s%> hath <S%H1692>cleaved<s%> to my <S%H3709>hands<s%>:
Then let me <S%H2232>sow<s%>, and let <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>; <S%H6631>Yea<s%>, let the produce of my field be rooted <S%H8327>out<s%>.
If my <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath been <S%H6601>enticed<s%> unto a <S%H802>woman<s%>, And I have laid <S%H693>wait<s%> at my <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H6607>door<s%>;
Then let my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H2912>grind<s%> unto <S%H312>another<s%>, And let <S%H312>others<s%> bow down upon <S%H3766>her<s%>.
For that were a heinous <S%H2154>crime<s%>; <S%H5771>Yea<s%>, it were an iniquity to be punished by the <S%H6414>judges<s%>:
For it is a <S%H784>fire<s%> that <S%H398>consumeth<s%> unto <S%H11>Destruction<s%>, And would root <S%H8327>out<s%> all mine <S%H8393>increase<s%>.
If I have <S%H3988>despised<s%> the <S%H4941>cause<s%> of my <S%H5650>man-servant<s%> or of my <S%H519>maid-servant<s%>, When they contended with <S%H7379>me<s%>;
What then shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> when <S%H410>God<s%> riseth <S%H6965>up<s%>? And when he <S%H6485>visiteth<s%>, what shall I answer <S%H7725>him<s%>?
Did not he that <S%H6213>made<s%> me in the <S%H990>womb<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>him<s%>? And did not one <S%H3559>fashion<s%> us in the <S%H7358>womb<s%>?
If I have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> from their <S%H2656>desire<s%>, Or have caused the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H490>widow<s%> to <S%H3615>fail<s%>,
Or have <S%H398>eaten<s%> my <S%H6595>morsel<s%> <S%H3490>alone<s%>, And the fatherless hath not eaten <S%H398>thereof<s%>
(Nay <S%H5271><s%>, from my youth he grew <S%H1431>up<s%> with me as with a <S%H1>father<s%>, And her have I <S%H5148>guided<s%> from my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>womb<s%>);
If I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> any <S%H6>perish<s%> for want of <S%H3830>clothing<s%>, Or that the <S%H34>needy<s%> had no <S%H3682>covering<s%>;
If his <S%H2504>loins<s%> have not <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H2552>me<s%>, And if he hath not been warmed with the <S%H1488>fleece<s%> of my <S%H3532>sheep<s%>;
If I have lifted <S%H5130>up<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, Because I <S%H7200>saw<s%> my <S%H5833>help<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>:
Then let my shoulder <S%H5307>fall<s%> from the <S%H7929>shoulder-blade<s%>, And mine <S%H248>arm<s%> be <S%H7665>broken<s%> from the <S%H7070>bone<s%>.
For <S%H343>calamity<s%> from <S%H410>God<s%> is a <S%H6343>terror<s%> to <S%H7613>me<s%>, And by reason of his majesty I can do <S%H3201>nothing<s%>.
If I have <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> my <S%H3689>hope<s%>, And have <S%H559>said<s%> to the fine <S%H3800>gold<s%>, Thou art my <S%H4009>confidence<s%>;
If I have <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> because my <S%H2428>wealth<s%> was <S%H7227>great<s%>, And because my <S%H3027>hand<s%> had <S%H4672>gotten<s%> <S%H3524>much<s%>;
If I have <S%H7200>beheld<s%> the <S%H216>sun<s%> when it <S%H1984>shined<s%>, Or the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in <S%H3368>brightness<s%>,
And my <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath been <S%H5643>secretly<s%> <S%H6601>enticed<s%>, And my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> hath <S%H5401>kissed<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%>:
This also were an <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be punished by the <S%H6416>judges<s%>; For I should have <S%H3584>denied<s%> the <S%H410>God<s%> that is <S%H4605>above<s%>.
If I have <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> at the <S%H6365>destruction<s%> of him that <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H5782>me<s%>, Or lifted up myself when <S%H7451>evil<s%> found <S%H4672>him<s%>;
(Yea <S%H5414><s%>, I have not suffered my <S%H2441>mouth<s%> to <S%H2398>sin<s%> By <S%H7592>asking<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%> with a <S%H423>curse<s%>);
If the <S%H4962>men<s%> of my <S%H168>tent<s%> have not <S%H559>said<s%>, Who can <S%H5414>find<s%> one that hath not been <S%H7646>filled<s%> with his <S%H1320>meat<s%>?
(The <S%H1616>sojourner<s%> hath not <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in the <S%H2351>street<s%>; But I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H1817>doors<s%> to the <S%H734>traveller<s%>);
If like <S%H121>Adam<s%> I have <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, By <S%H2934>hiding<s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in my <S%H2243>bosom<s%>,

Because I <S%H6206>feared<s%> the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, And the <S%H937>contempt<s%> of <S%H4940>families<s%> <S%H2865>terrified<s%> <S%H1826>me<s%>, So that I kept silence, and went not <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%>â€”

Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> I had one to <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8420>me<s%>! (Lo, here is my signature, let the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H5612>me<s%>); And that I had the indictment which mine <S%H376>adversary<s%> hath <S%H3789>written<s%>!
Surely I would <S%H5375>carry<s%> it upon my <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>; I would <S%H6029>bind<s%> it unto me as a <S%H5850>crown<s%>:
I would <S%H5046>declare<s%> unto him the <S%H4557>number<s%> of my <S%H6806>steps<s%>; As a <S%H5057>prince<s%> would I go near unto <S%H7126>him<s%>.
If my <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H2199>crieth<s%> out against <S%H3162>me<s%>, And the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> thereof weep <S%H1058>together<s%>;
If I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H3581>fruits<s%> thereof without <S%H3701>money<s%>, Or have caused the <S%H1167>owners<s%> thereof to <S%H5301>lose<s%> their <S%H5315>life<s%>:
Let <S%H2336>thistles<s%> <S%H3318>grow<s%> instead of <S%H2406>wheat<s%>, And <S%H890>cockle<s%> instead of <S%H8184>barley<s%>. The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H347>Job<s%> are <S%H8552>ended<s%>.
